statements: DELETE FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 123 AND achievement_name = 'First Victory';
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 123 AND achievement_name = 'Completed Level 10';
DELETE FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 50 AND currency_balance < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND level < 5;
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_profiles WHERE currency_balance <= 0);
DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id NOT IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_profiles);
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1 AND item_name = 'sword';
DELETE FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 123 AND friend_id = 456;
